alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 12:28PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Craven, southwestern Beaufort and west central Pamlico Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1227 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Askins, or 11 miles north of New Bern. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blounts Creek, Vanceboro, Askins, Cayton, Cox Crossroads, Wilmar and Ernul. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven
